item.description:
Description

The new video from Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth is out!

Watch Explosive Evidence with us in Nashua Tuesday night. You can watch the trailer on YouTube here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yIOC1J44RYw.

Join 23-year architect Richard Gage, AIA, in this feature-length documentary with cutting-edge 9/11 evidence from more than 50 top experts in their fields -- high-rise architects, structural engineers, physicists, chemical engineers, firefighters, metallurgists, explosives experts, controlled demolition technicians, and more. Each is highly qualified in his/her respective fields. Several have Ph.D's -- including National Medal of Science awardee Lynn Margulis. She, along with the other experts, exposes the fraud of NIST and discusses how the scientific method should have been applied and acknowledges the "overwhelming" evidence of high temperature incendiaries in all dust samples of the WTC.

9/11 family members and psychologists round out the professional showing and tie it all together in this milestone production: http://911expertsspeakout.org/.

-----------------------------------------------------

Please join us at 7 PM at Balanced Health Center and bring a friend.
Also, bring a snack and a box of tea for the house. You can bring any other beverage, as well. We just try to increase our host's inventory of interesting teas.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the training room on the right down the hall.
item.name: Nashua - Explosive Evidence
